name: Education is a Priority
title: High Investment in Tertiary Education
description: In 2016, Burkina Faso's government expenditure per student in tertiary education was 351.47% of GDP per capita, indicating a strong commitment to higher education.

name: Social Safety Net Gaps
title: Limited Social Protection for the Poorest
description: In 2021, only 4.68% of total social protection and labor benefits reached the poorest quintile, highlighting a significant gap in social safety nets.

name: Insurance Inequality
title: Minimal Social Insurance for the Needy
description: In 2018, a mere 3.01% of social insurance benefits were directed towards the poorest quintile, underscoring disparities in social insurance distribution.
